name: Dare Fight - Fun and Fast-Paced Party Game
name_original: Dare Fight - Fun and Fast-Paced Party Game
description:
Dare Fight is a fast-paced party game for 2 to 10 players in which they have to complete all kinds of funny challenges.

Your group gets split into two teams and you compete to see who is the best.

Teams compete in various challenges before the 20 seconds timer runs out. You can determine what the losing team has to do. Maybe drink penalty shots or making fun things in front of the others.

Dare Fight is unique party and drinking game for adults that you can play wherever you go. Just a single device and a few friends are needed to play it!

CHALLENGES LIKE
- Introduce yourself without closing your mouth
- Name 3 animals whose milk you can drink
- Count to 10 in a different language
- Do the Macarena dance
- Touch somebody ear to ear

FEATURES
- Unique Party Game for 2-10 Players
- Hundreds of Funny Challenges
- Play on A Single Device
- Available in 3 Different Languages

All that you need for a crazy party night is Dare Fight and something to drink!

Dare Fight - Fun and Fast-Paced Party Game for adults

Social Game. Party and Drinking Game.
